actions.create.application.access.denied: You are not authorized to complete this action. See your cluster administrator for role-based access control information.
table.name: Applications
table.column.application.name: Name
table.filter.type.acm.application.label: Type
table.header.application.type.tooltip: Link to Learn more about different types
table.header.application.namespace.toolt: Displays the namespace of the application resource, which by default is where the application deploys other resources. For Argo applications, this is the destination namespace.
table.header.application.clusters.toolti: Displays the number of remote and local clusters where resources for the application are deployed. For an individual Argo application, the name of the destination cluster is displayed. Click to search for all related clusters.
table.header.application.resource.toolti: Provides links to each of the resource repositories used by the application.
table.header.application.timeWindow.tool: Indicates if updates to any of the application resources are subject to a deployment time window.
no-resource.application.title: You don’t have any applications
no-resource.application.message: Click the {0} button to create your resource.
no-resource.subscription.title: You don’t have any subscriptions
no-resource.placementrule.title: You don’t have any placement rules
no-resource.channel.title: You don’t have any channels
no-resource.documentation.message: View the documentation for more information.
